name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ ヴィオラ
summary:
人型兵器「スレイブマシン」のパイロットで
ライバルのヴィオラ・ウォーレンと、
長い熾烈な戦いを繰り広げていた。
--
In the final,try attack on her weak point to ens it up!
A long fierce battle with rival Viola Warren,
a pilot of Human Weapon "Slave Machine"
is keeping on and on.
In the final,try attack on her weak point to
ens it up!

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
